byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED and EVELYN M. RUSLI

abstract: Groupon reported that it nearly broke even in the third quarter and disclosed an expected I.P.O. price range that would value the company at as much as $11.4 billion.
snippet: Groupon reported that it nearly broke even in the third quarter and disclosed an expected I.P.O. price range that would value the company at as much as $11.4 billion.

headline.main: Groupon Narrows Losses Ahead of Its Pitch to Investors
